name: Data availability - "Cryptic speciation challenges conservation and management of mycological resources"
tagline: Data availability for editors and peer-reviewers at the time of submission for the purposes of evaluating the manuscript
body:
### Authors 
Ricardo Arraiano-Castilho<sup>1,5</sup>, Ismail K. Saglam<sup>2,3,5</sup>, Sean M. O'Rourke<sup>2</sup>, Michael R. Miller<sup>2,6</sup>, Albano Beja-Pereira<sup>1,4,6</sup>  
<sup>1</sup>CIBIO/InBIO, Centro de Investigação em Biodiversidade e Recursos Genéticos, Campus Agrário de Vairão, Universidade do Porto, 4485-661, Vairão, Portugal  
<sup>2</sup>Genetic Diversity Research Group, Department of Animal Science, University of California, One Shields Avenue, Davis CA 95616, USA   
<sup>3</sup>Hacettepe University, Department of Biology, Ecological Sciences Research Laboratories, Beytepe, 06800, Ankara, Turkey    
<sup>4</sup>Faculdade de Ciências, Universidade do Porto, Rua do Campo Alegre s⁄n. 4169-007 Porto, Portugal    
<sup>5</sup>Co-first author.  
<sup>6</sup>Co-senior author.  

### Correspondence and requests for materials should be addressed to:  
1- Ricardo Arraiano Castilho - Address: CIBIO/InBIO, Centro de Investigação em Biodiversidade e Recursos Genéticos, Campus Agrário de Vairão, Universidade do Porto, 4485-661, Vairão, Portugal, e-mail: rcastilho@cibio.up.pt   
2- Michael R. Miller - Address: Genetic Diversity Research Group, Department of Animal Science, University of California, One Shields Avenue, Davis CA 95616, USA, e-mail: micmiller@ucdavis.edu
